weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia will reopen its border to Victoria in less than three weeks
weeklyTopNews.summary: From 1 December, Victorians entering South Australia will no longer have to quarantine.

weeklyTopNews.title: Coronavirus testing ramped up in western Sydney as NSW records fifth straight day with zero local cases
weeklyTopNews.summary: The state is urging residents of northwest Sydney to get tested as traces of the virus were found in two local sewage pumping stations.

weeklyTopNews.title: 'A difficult case': Aged care worker who returned to South Australia from Victoria tests positive for coronavirus
weeklyTopNews.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services has requested that anyone who visited Melbourne Central last Sunday between 2pm and 5pm, or were at Melbourne Airport's Terminal Four from noon to 1pm on Monday get themselves tested.

weeklyTopNews.title: Restrictions on household gatherings unlikely to ease before Christmas, NSW premier warns
weeklyTopNews.summary: NSW Premier Gladys Berejiklian has revealed that Christmas celebrations could stay capped at twenty visitors even as the state recorded 3 days in a row without a locally acquired case.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria travel restrictions scrapped as state records no new Covid cases for nine days
weeklyTopNews.summary: The 25km travel limit and the separation of Regional Victoria from Metropolitan Melbourne have come to an end as Victoria recorded no new cases for the ninth day in a row.
